div.h4: We strive to be the preeminent public school system in the Texas Panhandle focusing on student achievement, quality instruction, customer service and cost effectiveness. Our students will become empowered through academic rigor and character development to become successful citizens.

div.p:

The influence of a great teacher can never be erased.
